title: Inconsistent icons on active connection right mouse menu
author: igor2x
body_snippet: I have downloaded mRemoteNG v1.78.2-NB-3208 x64. Compare two right menus: 1. Disconnect icon on left side should be the same as on right side. 2. Second and third disconnect icons should probably be something else. 3. Duplicate tab on left side should have the same icon as on the right side. The whole idea is, more you use right mouse buttons more quickly you can ...
